  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Main initialize class. Pulls all customers from database and displays in TableView
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onActionCountryChange

      public void onActionCountryChange()
      Country Combo Box Change Handler Pulls the records for the divisions matching the selected country and populates division Combo Box

    • onActionSave

      public void onActionSave()
      Save Customer Click. Handles the Customer form. Switches between Save and Modify if a customer is being modified

    • onActionClear

      public void onActionClear()
      Reset Click. Resets to blank on Adding. Resets to current customer data on Modify.

    • onActionBackToAdd

      public void onActionBackToAdd()
      Back To Add Form. Resets Modify to switch back to Add view.

    • onActionModifyCurrent

      public void onActionModifyCurrent()
      Modify Customer Click. Populates Customer Form with customer Data for modification.

    • onActionRemoveCurrent

      public void onActionRemoveCurrent()
      Removes Customer. Removes User and Appointments.
